SELECT COUNT(NOTICE_NUM) FROM NOTICE
TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchKeyword}, '%')

SELECT N.NOTICE_NUM , N.TITLE , N.CONTENT , CONCAT(O.ORG_NAME, '/', U.USER_NAME) AS CREATE_USER , DATE_FORMAT(N.CREATE_DATETIME, '%Y-%m-%d') AS CREATE_DATETIME FROM NOTICE N JOIN USER U ON N.CREATE_USER = U.EMP_NUM JOIN ORGANIZATION O ON U.ORG_ID = O.ORG_ID WHERE NOTICE_NUM = #{noticeNum}
